column5: What is the best way to get to Red Lake Ontario, from Detroit, by air? Any help is appreciated, thanks
Call Red Lake Travel Agency in Red Lake, nice people who can let you know what's available, costs and book it for you.
I agree. Red lake travel specializes in getting fisherman in and out of redlake the same day. You can save a little bit of money by flying into Kenora and renting a car for the three hour drive.
Any travel agent can set this up for you. Red Lake is a popular destination not only for tourists but for people in mining and forestry. It is actually a fairly busy airport for a small community.
